msg: Add ability to create a shaded -sources jar along with the shaded code jar.

author: maartenc
msg: The publication artifact element is extensible as well

author: djd
msg: TestConfiguration.start/stopNetworkServer indicated they use the server defined by the current configuration, but they didn't. Changed the code to use the utility method provided by NetworkServerTestSetup to obtain a NetworkServerControl configured to the current configuration.
